page.title: 06ABERDEEN: CHILDREN'S GAMES.
page.content:
ABERDEEN: CHILDREN'S GAMES.
When I am outside I like playing Stick in the Mud. To play this game you need several other children and someone is elected as the "man"; this person must try and catch the others . When caught you must stand with your legs and arms open and straight. After being caught three times you are out of the game.
To get released from the standing position someone, not the man, must crawl between your legs. When someone is between your legs they are safe from the "man".This continues until everyone has been caught three times or when everyone is in the standing position.
